segments.text: Thank you . I'm very glad to be here . As Ms . Tina said , the purpose of my presentation today is to familiarize you with the new EBB . As you probably know , EBB stands for Electronic Book Player . Our company put the original EBB on the market a year ago , but we have since all developed an improved model which we believe will be a big seller in both China and the U . S .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ms . Yang , can you tell us in what ways the new EBB is better than the old model ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . First of all , the old model had a rather small screen , so not much information could appear at one time . So on the new model , we have made the screen much bigger and ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , but what are the Mbps mainly used for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , there are many uses and I'll explain them in detail a little later . First , I'd like to ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Before you go on , Ms Yang , could you tell us if the original EBB sold well in the U . S . ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were right , Mr . Tim . Your colleagues do want know all about it .
segments.speaker: S1
